~ Register Page

1. Enter - Register Button
2.



~ Preview Page

1. 'Tab' (Edit Mode) - Focus cursor on the next text of the same column
2. 'Tab' (Add Keyword) - Focus cursor between the textbox of the same pair
3. 'ctrl + E/e' or 'ctrl + S/s' or 'Enter' - Switch between save and edit mode
4. 'ctrl + A/a/+' - Add new Keyword
5. 'ctrl + C/c' - Clear All Keywords
6. 'Arrow Up' - Scroll Top
7. 'Arrow Down' - Scroll Bottom
